name: Honeycomb Enigma
description:
Description

Honeycomb Enigma is a difficult hexagon based puzzle game.

The task is to fill the complete hive with honey. You place one bee on a honeycomb and it will fill it with honey. If a honeycomb is surrounded by three filled neighbours, this honeycomb will fill itself automatically.

Try to fill the hive with as less bees as possible to get the golden crown!

Epilogue

This game is a prototype. It has five levels yet.

If you think this game is fun and you want more of it, let me know. Then I will add more levels and other features.

Moreover, you can check out our other games here.
